name: Creator AVR
description: Creator AVR is packed with features for conducting remote learning in a hands-on, immersive environment. Learning can be independent, or conducted in groups in touch, virtual, and augmented reality modes, providing a world of possibilities for remote learning. Using the app, teachers and students can quickly create compelling interactive lessons on their smart devices or desktop using EON Realitys library of more than 1 million digital assets.  Key Features include  - AVR Labs and Virtual Classrooms that provide a hands-on learning experience and the ability to conduct immersive lessons through augmented and virtual reality  - Live classroom discussions allowing up to 100 students to gather and interact virtually with the lesson and the teacher in the same virtual space  - Intuitive, code-free platform, to encourage student created learning content for deeper learning and engagement  - Peer review and feedback through lesson sharing  - Embedding of asynchronous videos allowing access to self-paced learning and high-quality materials at any time  - Real time, database-driven, authentic assessment features and quizzes to allow effective tracking of student progress
